companies.name: Ecovyst LLC
companies.reason: Ecovyst is trending due to recent strategic decisions including an upgrade from BMO Capital, which raised its price target from $10 to $14 following positive earnings calls and business shifts towards core sulfuric acid and catalyst activation operations. The company has also become a participant member of the United Nations Global Compact, focusing on sustainability goals.

companies.name: Azure Power Global Limited
companies.reason: Azure Power is in the news after addressing a lawsuit that could result in a settlement of $23 million related to bribery allegations. This situation has prompted a reevaluation of its market position, which has impacted its stock performance and investor confidence. Additionally, it has recently secured refinancing and earlier than expected bond prepayments, showcasing their efforts to stabilize operations post-controversy.
